name: ai-chat-interface
description: Infrastructure for AI Chat Interface with Traefik, LibreChat, and more

scripts.prepare:dev: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:dev
scripts.rebuild:local:api: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache api && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d api
scripts.rebuild:local:mcp-calculator: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-calculator && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-calculator
scripts.rebuild:local:mcp-image-gen: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-image-gen && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-image-gen
scripts.rebuild:local:mcp-openstreetmap: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-openstreetmap && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-openstreetmap
scripts.rebuild:local:mcp-ytptube: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-ytptube && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-ytptube
scripts.rebuild:local:mcp-db-timetable: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-db-timetable && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-db-timetable
scripts.rebuild:local:mcp-stackoverflow: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-stackoverflow && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-stackoverflow
scripts.rebuild:local:mcp-npm-search: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-npm-search && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-npm-search
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:api: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache api && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d api
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:rag_api: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache rag_api && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d rag_api
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:mcp-calculator: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-calculator && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-calculator
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:mcp-image-gen: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-image-gen && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-image-gen
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:mcp-openstreetmap: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-openstreetmap && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-openstreetmap
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:mcp-ytptube: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-ytptube && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-ytptube
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:mcp-db-timetable: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-db-timetable && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-db-timetable
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:mcp-stackoverflow: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-stackoverflow && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-stackoverflow
scripts.rebuild:local-dev:mcp-npm-search: docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local build --no-cache mcp-npm-search && docker compose -f docker-compose.local-dev.yml --env-file .env.local up -d mcp-npm-search
scripts.test:librechat:link-agents: (cd dev/agents && npm run build && npm link) && (cd dev/librechat && npm link @librechat/agents)
